Summary: Platform hovering above with colored lights
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving west on the Autobahn 3 (A3) near Aschaffenburg, just after passing through a series of noise-reducing highway enclosures, I witnessed a craft with flashing colored lights hovering directly overhead travelling at the same speed as the traffic. After a few moments, it sped to the left at an amazing speed and continued following the traffic from behind groups of trees on the southern side of the autobahn before disappearing.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Aschaffenburg
There were no other sightings in Aschaffenburg on or around September 9th 2008
